import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import "./App.css"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; function App() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "YOUR_SERVICE_ID", "YOUR_USER_TEMPLATE_ID", form.current, "YOUR_PUBLIC_KEY" ) .then( (result) => { alert("Message Sent Successfully!"); }, (error) => { alert("Something went wrong, please try again."); } ); }; return (
